form.label: IOC Dashboard (V7.1)
form.description: V7 Additions: Dashboard Panels Now Utilize A Flow Of Operations To Limit Concurrent Searches

search.query:
| loadjob savedsearch="g.keil:DCO:Total IOC Count" ``` | inputlookup IP_iocs_KV | stats count as IP_IOC_COUNT | append [ | inputlookup URL_iocs_KV | stats count as URL_IOC_COUNT ] | append [ | inputlookup Domain_iocs_KV | stats count as Domain_IOC_COUNT ] | append [ | inputlookup MD5_iocs_KV | stats count as MD5_IOC_COUNT ] | append [ | inputlookup SHA256_iocs_KV | stats count as SHA256_IOC_COUNT ] | addtotals fieldname=sum | table sum | stats sum(sum) as grand_total | table grand_total ```
```$NOOP_1$```

single.option: Count of All IOCs Detectable in Splunk, not how many positive hits.

search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.IP by IP.id_orig_h | rename IP.id_orig_h as src | fields src | where isnotnull(src) | lookup local=t IP_iocs_KV indicator AS src OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats dc(src) as "Unique Source IP IOCs Found"
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_2a$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.IP by IP.id_orig_h,_time | rename IP.id_orig_h as src | fields src | where isnotnull(src) | lookup local=t IP_iocs_KV indicator AS src OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats count ```$NOOP_1$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.IP by IP.id_resp_h | rename IP.id_resp_h as dest | fields dest | where isnotnull(dest) | lookup local=t IP_iocs_KV indicator AS dest OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats dc(dest) as "Unique Destination IP IOCs Found"
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_2d$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.IP by IP.id_resp_h,_time | rename IP.id_resp_h as dest | fields dest | where isnotnull(dest) | lookup local=t IP_iocs_KV indicator AS dest OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats count ```$NOOP_1$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.DNS by DNS.query | rename DNS.query as query | fields query | where isnotnull(query) | lookup local=t Domain_iocs_KV indicator AS query OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats dc(query) as "Unique Query IOCs Found"
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_2b$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.DNS by DNS.query,_time | rename DNS.query as query | fields query | where isnotnull(query) | lookup local=t Domain_iocs_KV indicator AS query OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats count ```$NOOP_1$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.DNS by DNS.answer | rename DNS.answer as answer | fields answer | where isnotnull(answer) | lookup local=t URL_iocs_KV indicator AS answer OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats dc(answer) as "Unique URL Found"
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_2e$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.DNS by DNS.answer,_time | rename DNS.answer as answer | fields answer | where isnotnull(answer) | lookup local=t URL_iocs_KV indicator AS answer OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats count ```$NOOP_1$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Hashes.Sysmon by Sysmon.MD5 | rename Sysmon.MD5 as MD5 | fields MD5 | where isnotnull(MD5) | lookup local=t MD5_iocs_KV indicator AS MD5 OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats dc(src) as "Unique MD5 IOCs Found"
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_2c$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Hashes.Sysmon by Sysmon.MD5,_time | rename Sysmon.MD5 as MD5 | fields MD5 | where isnotnull(MD5) | lookup local=t MD5_iocs_KV indicator AS MD5 OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats count ```$NOOP_1$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Hashes.Sysmon by Sysmon.SHA256 | rename Sysmon.SHA256 as SHA256 | fields SHA256 | where isnotnull(SHA256) | lookup local=t SHA256_iocs_KV indicator AS SHA256 OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats dc(SHA256) as "Unique SHA256 IOCs Found"
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_2f$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Hashes.Sysmon by Sysmon.SHA256,_time | rename Sysmon.SHA256 as SHA256 | fields SHA256 | where isnotnull(SHA256) | lookup local=t SHA256_iocs_KV indicator AS SHA256 OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors | where isnotnull(published_date) | stats count ```$NOOP_1$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.IP by IP.id_orig_h,_time | rename IP.id_orig_h as src | fields src,_time | where isnotnull(src) | lookup local=t IP_iocs_KV indicator AS src OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors, malicious_confidence | where isnotnull(published_date) | foreach kill_chains malware_families actors malicious_confidence [ eval <<FIELD>> = if(len('<<FIELD>>') == 0, "N/A", '<<FIELD>>')] | stats count by malicious_confidence,src, kill_chains, actors, malware_families, published_date, $ShowTime$
| eval priority=if(visibility="High", 0, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Medium", 1, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Low", 2, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="No Instances Found", 3, priority) | sort priority, -count
| rename src AS "Instance",kill_chains AS "Kill Chain",malware_families AS "Malware Family",actors AS "Actor",published_date AS "Publish Date", count AS "Count", malicious_confidence AS "Malicious Confidence" | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "Malicious Confidence"="No Instances Found" | eval Instance="-" | eval "Kill Chain"="-" | eval Actor="-" | eval "Malware Family"="-" | eval "Publish Date"="-" | rename count AS Count ]
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_3a$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.IP by IP.id_resp_h,_time | rename IP.id_resp_h as dest | fields dest,_time | where isnotnull(dest) | lookup local=t IP_iocs_KV indicator AS dest OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors, malicious_confidence | where isnotnull(published_date) | foreach kill_chains malware_families actors malicious_confidence [ eval <<FIELD>> = if(len('<<FIELD>>') == 0, "N/A", '<<FIELD>>')] |stats count by malicious_confidence,dest, kill_chains, actors, malware_families, published_date, $ShowTime$
| eval priority=if(visibility="High", 0, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Medium", 1, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Low", 2, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="No Instances Found", 3, priority) | sort priority, -count
| rename dest AS "Instance",kill_chains AS "Kill Chain",malware_families AS "Malware Family",actors AS "Actor",published_date AS "Publish Date", count AS "Count", malicious_confidence AS "Malicious Confidence" | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "Malicious Confidence"="No Instances Found" | eval Instance="-" | eval "Kill Chain"="-" | eval Actor="-" | eval "Malware Family"="-" | eval "Publish Date"="-" | rename count AS Count]
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_3d$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.DNS by DNS.query,_time | rename DNS.query as query | fields query,_time | where isnotnull(query) | lookup local=t Domain_iocs_KV indicator AS query OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors, malicious_confidence | where isnotnull(published_date) | foreach kill_chains malware_families actors malicious_confidence [ eval <<FIELD>> = if(len('<<FIELD>>') == 0, "N/A", '<<FIELD>>')] |stats count by malicious_confidence,query, kill_chains, actors, malware_families, published_date, $ShowTime$
| eval priority=if(visibility="High", 0, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Medium", 1, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Low", 2, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="No Instances Found", 3, priority) | sort priority
| rename query AS "Instance",kill_chains AS "Kill Chain",malware_families AS "Malware Family",actors AS "Actor",published_date AS "Publish Date", count AS "Count", malicious_confidence AS "Malicious Confidence" | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "Malicious Confidence"="No Instances Found" | eval Instance="-" | eval "Kill Chain"="-" | eval Actor="-" | eval "Malware Family"="-" | eval "Publish Date"="-" | rename count AS Count]
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_3b$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Zeek.DNS by DNS.answer,_time | rename DNS.answer as answer | fields answer,_time | where isnotnull(answer) | lookup local=t URL_iocs_KV indicator AS answer OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors, malicious_confidence | where isnotnull(published_date) | foreach kill_chains malware_families actors malicious_confidence [ eval <<FIELD>> = if(len('<<FIELD>>') == 0, "N/A", '<<FIELD>>')] |stats count by malicious_confidence,answer, kill_chains, actors, malware_families, published_date, $ShowTime$
| eval priority=if(visibility="High", 0, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Medium", 1, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Low", 2, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="No Instances Found", 3, priority) | sort priority
| rename answer AS "Instance",kill_chains AS "Kill Chain",malware_families AS "Malware Family",actors AS "Actor",published_date AS "Publish Date", count AS "Count", malicious_confidence AS "Malicious Confidence" | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "Malicious Confidence"="No Instances Found" | eval Instance="-" | eval "Kill Chain"="-" | eval Actor="-" | eval "Malware Family"="-" | eval "Publish Date"="-" | rename count AS Count]
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_3e$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Hashes.Sysmon by Sysmon.MD5,_time | rename Sysmon.MD5 as MD5 | fields MD5,_time | where isnotnull(MD5) | lookup local=t MD5_iocs_KV indicator AS MD5 OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors, malicious_confidence | where isnotnull(published_date) | foreach kill_chains malware_families actors malicious_confidence [ eval <<FIELD>> = if(len('<<FIELD>>') == 0, "N/A", '<<FIELD>>')] |stats count by malicious_confidence,MD5, kill_chains, actors, malware_families, published_date, $ShowTime$
| eval priority=if(visibility="High", 0, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Medium", 1, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Low", 2, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="No Instances Found", 3, priority) | sort priority
| rename MD5 AS "Instance",kill_chains AS "Kill Chain",malware_families AS "Malware Family",actors AS "Actor",published_date AS "Publish Date", count AS "Count", malicious_confidence AS "Malicious Confidence" | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "Malicious Confidence"="No Instances Found" | eval Instance="-" | eval "Kill Chain"="-" | eval Actor="-" | eval "Malware Family"="-" | eval "Publish Date"="-" | rename count AS Count]
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_3c$```

| tstats summariesonly=$SumSearch$ count from datamodel=Hashes.Sysmon by Sysmon.SHA256,_time | rename Sysmon.SHA256 as SHA256 | fields SHA256,_time | where isnotnull(SHA256) | lookup local=t SHA256_iocs_KV indicator AS SHA256 OUTPUT kill_chains, published_date, malware_families, actors, malicious_confidence | where isnotnull(published_date) | foreach kill_chains malware_families actors malicious_confidence [ eval <<FIELD>> = if(len('<<FIELD>>') == 0, "N/A", '<<FIELD>>')] |stats count by malicious_confidence,SHA256, kill_chains, actors, malware_families, published_date, $ShowTime$
| eval priority=if(visibility="High", 0, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Medium", 1, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="Low", 2, priority) | eval priority=if(visibility="No Instances Found", 3, priority) | sort priority
| rename SHA256 AS "Instance",kill_chains AS "Kill Chain",malware_families AS "Malware Family",actors AS "Actor",published_date AS "Publish Date", count AS "Count", malicious_confidence AS "Malicious Confidence" | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "Malicious Confidence"="No Instances Found" | eval Instance="-" | eval "Kill Chain"="-" | eval Actor="-" | eval "Malware Family"="-" | eval "Publish Date"="-" | rename count AS Count]
```$panel_show$ $NOOP_3f$```
index=$breakdown$ | head 1
